title: Win every Warhammer paint, brush, and tool in GW competition
description:
Games Workshop has just launched a massive competition that gives fans the chance to win one of every Warhammer paint, brush, and hobby tool that Citadel currently makes. All you have to do to enter the prize draw is be subscribed to the Warhammer+ service by the end of March. Only those aged 18 or over … Continued

title: MTG Sacrifice explained, and the best cards for Commander
description:
Looking to add a splash of MTG Sacrifice to your Commander deck? There are plenty of ways to get a card off the field and into your graveyard, and some methods are better than others. We’ve gathered our favorite MTG Sacrifice outlets into a handy list that can help you start deck-building.

Below you’ll find the best MTG Commanders, creatures, and more for your Sacrifice-heavy MTG Commander deck. Our list shows the range of ways you can start Sac-ing in the world’s bigg

title: Warhammer 40k’s best starting point isn’t the one you expect
description:
For seasoned veterans, the expansive scope of Warhammer 40k is what keeps the universe so magnetic. It never stops growing, like a living, breathing organism fuelled by the imagination of hundreds of fiercely talented model designers, authors, illustrators, narrative designers, and countless others.

title: Call of Cthulhu creator’s RPG design prize pays out $10k
description:
Long-standing RPG publisher Chaosium, creator of the classic Call of Cthulhu horror RPG, is offering cash prizes for independent game designers to create new RPGs. $10,000 total will be available in the Basic Roleplaying: Universal Game Engine Design Challenge, “to financially assist new and upcoming creators” to publish games based on the Basic Roleplaying engine. … Continued

title: Discworld RPG boss explores game’s playable Pratchett races
description:
Modiphius' new Discworld tabletop RPG will include a selection of playable races from Terry Pratchett's fantasy novels, starting with (but not limited to) those most commonly found in the central city of Ankh-Morpork, the publisher's founder Chris Birch confirms to Wargamer.

title: WizKids announces even more DnD 50th anniversary minis
description:
DnD miniature maker WizKids has revealed two secret rare models that will be hidden in packs of the upcoming D&D Icons of the Realms: 50th anniversary booster boxes. The righteous Paladin and hellish Fiend are inspired by classic DnD artwork from the AD&D Player’s Handbook. WizKids has already revealed most of the minis for the … Continued

title: Heroscape board game is back, despite canned crowdfunder
description:
In long-awaited news for fans of the Heroscape board game, the classic strategy game will get a spread of new releases this year. Although publisher Avalon Hill declared its project to resurrect the game dead in November 2022, after a crowdfunding campaign failed to meet its target, new publisher Renegade Game Studios has five box sets … Continued
